tool_description: This API provides a simple way to filter profanity from text. It can detect profanity in text, and replace it with a specified replacement string.
name: Profanity Filter_v2
title: Profanity Filter

api_list.name: /profanity-filter/health
api_list.description: Return the health status of the API. Returns current UTC time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://profanity-filter1.p.rapidapi.com/profanity-filter/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "profanity-filter1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://profanity-filter1.p.rapidapi.com/profanity-filter/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "profanity-filter1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
